ch0007_10_acerola/0101_0701_01_10:
Hiya, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m so glad
you’re here!
ch0007_10_acerola/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s have tons of battles again today!
ch0007_10_acerola/7101_0701_01_10:
Tapu Bulu is super strong, but it doesn’t seem to
like conflict.
ch0007_10_acerola/7101_0701_02_10:
Apparently, the Tapu Bulu in Alola lives in ruins
in the desert.
ch0007_10_acerola/7101_0701_03_10:
Since it doesn’t like to fight, maybe that’s why it
hangs around places no one really visits.
ch0007_10_acerola/7102_0701_01_10:
Tapu Bulu is usually gentle and calm, but it’s scary
when it gets angry!
ch0007_10_acerola/7102_0701_02_10:
Make sure you take care of the environment so it
doesn’t get upset!
ch0007_10_acerola/7103_0701_01_10: Whatcha think of my sygna suit?
ch0007_10_acerola/7103_0701_02_10:
It’s cute, but there’s also something really majestic
about it, don’t ya think?
ch0007_10_acerola/7103_0701_03_10: Isn’t it stylish? I love it so much!
ch0007_10_acerola/7104_0701_01_10:
I come from a bloodline of people who did
amazing things a long, long time ago!
ch0007_10_acerola/7104_0701_02_10:
I hope I can be just as awesome as them when I
grow up!
ch0007_10_acerola/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you think there’s a cool secret in your
lineage, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0007_10_acerola/7105_0701_02_10:
I’ve been wondering about it since you’re such a
skilled Trainer!
ch0007_10_acerola/1701_0702_01_10:
If I find anything else good, I’ll be sure to share it
with you!
ch0007_10_acerola/2501_0701_01_10:
Tapu Bulu makes ringing sounds with its tail to let
its enemies know where it is. It avoids conflict
that way!
ch0007_10_acerola/2501_0701_02_10:
But sometimes it makes those sounds even when
no one’s around.
ch0007_10_acerola/2501_0701_03_10:
Strange, right? I wonder what it’s trying to
keep away.
ch0007_10_acerola/2501_0702_01_10:
I wish I could see whatever it is that
Tapu Bulu sees.
ch0007_10_acerola/2501_0702_02_10: Then we could be even better friends!
ch0007_10_acerola/2511_0701_01_10:
People in ancient times were pretty amazing.
They lived out in the wild!
ch0007_10_acerola/2511_0701_02_10: I’d get lost if I went out at night without any light!
ch0007_10_acerola/2511_0701_03_10:
If that ever happens, will you come save me?
*giggle*
ch0007_10_acerola/2511_0702_01_10:
Even in complete darkness, I’d feel safer if we
were together!
ch0007_10_acerola/2511_0702_02_10:
It’s so comforting to have someone you can trust
by your side.
ch0007_10_acerola/3001_0701_01_10:
Alola! Both people and Pokémon need the morning
sunshine to feel energized!
ch0007_10_acerola/3003_0701_01_10:
Even though Pasio’s an artificial island, it has a lot
of nature, which is really awesome!
ch0007_10_acerola/3005_0701_01_10:
*yawn* I’m getting sleepy. I hope I have the same
dream as my Pokémon.
